text: "You Have Placed a Chill in My Heart" is a song by the British pop duo (group of two singers) Eurythmics. It was written by Annie Lennox and David A. Stewart. It is on the duo's sixth album, Savage (1987). It was the fourth and last single from the album in the United Kingdom and the second single in the United States. Category:1988 songs Category:Eurythmics songs
title: You Have Placed a Chill in My Heart
